name: pom.xml
description: This is the Maven Project Object Model (POM) file for a Spring Boot application named 'demo'. It defines the project's configuration, including dependencies such as Spring Boot Actuator, Web, Data JPA, and H2 database. The file also includes a JaCoCo plugin for code coverage reporting. The main functionality of this project is to serve as a sample Spring Boot service, potentially used for testing or demonstration purposes.
